TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConnectionStringEditor extends System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor

summary.span: 为用户界面提供基类，以便在设计时选择和编辑连接字符串属性。

span.span: Provides a base class for a user interface to select and edit a connection string property at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例类是可选择和编辑连接字符串表达式，并将分配给控件属性的表达式可以在设计时使用的对象。An instance of the class is a object that can be used at design time to select and edit a connection string expression and to assign the expression to a control property. 例如，控件使用类在设计时设置的值属性。For example, the control uses the class at design time to set the value of the property. 使用特性将相关联的属性。Use the attribute to associate the with a property. 当在设计图面上编辑关联的属性时，设计器宿主调用方法。When the associated property is edited on the design surface, the designer host calls the method. 方法会显示用户界面，用于构建连接字符串表达式并返回用户选定的连接字符串。The method displays a user interface for building the connection string expression and returns the connection string that is selected by the user. 方法指示的用户界面的显示样式。The method indicates the display style of the user interface. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将相关联的实例类包含在自定义控件的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to associate an instance of the class with a property that is contained within a custom control. 当在设计图面上，编辑控件属性类提供了用户界面，可选择和编辑属性值的连接字符串。When the control property is edited in the design surface, the class provides the user interface to select and edit a connection string for the property value. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.design.connectionstringeditor/CS/ConnectionStringEditorSample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.design.connectionstringeditor/VB/ConnectionStringEditorSample.vb#2)]

span.span: Working with Connection Strings

MemberSignature.Value: public override object EditValue (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, IServiceProvider provider, object value);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object EditValue(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, class System.IServiceProvider provider, object value) cil managed
Public Overrides Function EditValue (context As ITypeDescriptorContext, provider As IServiceProvider, value As Object) As Object
public: override System::Object ^ EditValue(System::ComponentModel::ITypeDescriptorContext ^ context, IServiceProvider ^ provider, System::Object ^ value);

abstract member EditValue : System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext * IServiceProvider * obj -> obj override this.EditValue : System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext * IServiceProvider * obj -> obj

param.name: context
param.span: 用于获取其他上下文信息的 。

span.span: An to use to gain additional context information.

param.name: provider
param.span: 用来获得编辑服务的服务提供程序对象。

span.span: A service provider object through which to obtain editing services.
An instance of the object being edited.

summary.span: 使用指定的服务提供程序和上下文编辑指定对象的值。

span.span: Edits the value of the specified object by using the specified service provider and context.

returns.span: 所选的连接表达式（作为字符串对象）；否则，如果未选择连接表达式，则为传入的 。

span.span: The selected connection expression, as a string object; otherwise, if a connection expression was not selected, the same that was passed in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从开始编辑的用户界面`value`对象。The method starts the user interface for editing the `value` object. 设计器宿主调用与关联的连接字符串编辑器的方法时编辑属性的值。The designer host calls the method when you edit the value of a property that the connection string editor is associated with. 输入的服务提供程序用于获取中必须包含的任何编辑服务方法。The input service provider is used to obtain any editing services that are required within the method. 如果服务实现支持在指定的上下文中，方法初始化控件，它会提示您选择现有连接表达式或生成新的连接表达式。If an service implementation is supported in the specified context, the method initializes a control, which prompts you to select an existing connection expression or build a new connection expression. 如果服务实现不支持在指定的上下文中，方法显示的简单实例类，它会提示你输入表达式的连接字符串。If an service implementation is not supported in the specified context, the method displays a simple instance of the class, which prompts you to enter the connection expression string. 如果您取消而不选择连接表达式字符串，返回的对象等同于`value`参数。If you cancel without selecting a connection expression string, the returned object is the same as the `value` parameter.

span.span: Working with Connection Strings

param.span: 用于获取其他上下文信息的 。

span.span: An to use to gain additional context information.

summary.span: 返回与指定上下文的连接字符串编辑器关联的编辑样式。

span.span: Returns the editing style that is associated with the connection string editor for the specified context.

returns.span: 一个 枚举值，该值指示所提供的用户界面的编辑样式。

span.span: An enumeration value that indicates the editing style for the provided user interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下方法类返回值。By default, the method of the class returns the value. 如果服务实现支持在指定的上下文中，方法将返回值。If an service implementation is supported in the specified context, the method returns the value. 如果方法不支持在指定的上下文中，方法将返回值。If the method is not supported in the specified context, the method returns the value.

summary.span: 返回提供的 类实例的提供程序名称。

span.span: Returns the provider name for the provided instance of the class.
Always an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法获取的当前实例的提供程序名称类。The method gets the provider name for the current instance of the class. 例如，在类，该类派生自类，方法返回提供程序名称。For example, in the class, which is derived from class, the method returns the provider name.

span.span: A or an instance of a derived class.
A .

summary.span: 将提供程序名称放在 类的指定实例上。

span.span: Puts the provider name on the specified instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可设置提供程序名称`instance`参数。The method sets the provider name on the `instance` parameter. 例如，在`SqlDataSourceConnectionStringEditor`，又派生自类，此设置提供程序名称或添加对象，如果连接是配置的连接。For example, in the `SqlDataSourceConnectionStringEditor`, which derives from the class, this either sets the provider name or adds an object, if the connection is a configured connection. 在此实现中，方法不执行任何操作。In this implementation, the method does nothing.

span.span: Working with Connection Strings
